Articles.Content:
Hi Guys,

Being very much interested in space programmes, This community is useful for me. I am David, New to Kerbal Space Program. Hoping for a good time with all you valuable existing members an with newbies too.

Let us start together..

Hello and Welcome to the Forums

Oh, and once you start playing KSP you don't stop

Hi, welcome aboard.

Sure you will have a good time here, and we will see about your usefulness, too .
